text: 8.5: Kis 25.40; Nam 8.4; FG 7.44; Kor 2.17; Hi 9.23Kha nuianan Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgi ŋgari. Fhe Bakɨme Phen, ana guigira mbu Hevenan ki. Fhe Bakɨmen Sher Phen, ana Fhe Bakɨme Phena tum gum anan panpan ma. Fhe Bakɨme, Moses ana rotur muunga Sher Phena ndi fɨr za suaŋgi kameŋ fara muuŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu mba Sher Phenan muun saŋv, ndu mba mbɨkshɨman gu ndu khɨvigi Sher Phenan tum, ndu ara farar muuŋgi nen muuŋgiri.”
